start.title: Eagle Gateway Instructions
start.description: Before pairing a device first you will need the following to connect to your gateway:

prerequisites.setup: You have set up your EAGLE gateway as per the manufactures instructions.
prerequisites.ip: The static IP address of the EAGLE gateway which have assigned using your router.
prerequisites.id: You will need the three numbers indicated below which are located on the underside of the EAGLE gateway.

settings.title: EAGLE Gateway Settings
settings.description: Please enter the following gateway information and click next to connect and discover your devices

ip-address.label: IP Address
ip-address.invalid: Please enter a valid ip address.

cloud-id.label: Cloud ID
cloud-id.invalid: Please enter the 6 digit numeric Cloud ID.

mac-address.label: MAC Address
mac-address.invalid: Please enter the mac address without any spaces or dashes '-'.

install-code.label: Install Code
install-code.invalid: Please enter the install code without any spaces or dashes '-'.
